experience.title: Experience
experience.desexperience1: I participated in the development of the PeakU website as a Fullstack Developer, utilizing modern technologies such as Vue.js for the frontend and Python for the backend.
experience.desexperience2: I actively participated in the development of an innovative website designed for efficient inventory management, utilizing cutting-edge technologies such as React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. From conception to implementation, I contributed to the team to ensure the effective integration of key features.

project.title: Projects
project.weatherappDescription: WeatherApp is an intuitive application that keeps you updated on the weather conditions anywhere in the world. With a user-friendly and easy-to-use interface.
project.gitHubsearchusersDescription: GitHub-SearchUsers is an application that allows you to explore and discover developers on GitHub quickly and easily. This tool is designed to facilitate the search for developer profiles.
project.nextjSdashboardDescription: Next.JS Dashboard is a practice project designed to explore and become familiar with the Next.js framework.
project.landingpageDescription: The Practice Landing Page is a personal project showcasing skills in design, development, and marketing. Developed as part of a practice exercise.
